info.name: Rappelz Forum-SigsWithoutYoutube-FireFox
info.description: There's a time and a place for Autoplay, and sigs just ain't one of 'em. Make those in-sig Videos VANish. Eyyyyyyy~ NOTE: This is redundant now, use (MOD)Alexander's suggestion [tinyurl.com/greatsuggestionfromalex] instead!
info.additionalInfo:
1. Log into YouTube and set your account to Restricted Mode
(This prevents That Video from playing)

2. Apply this theme
(This removes any iframe elements from inside Signatures, doesn't affect videos in posts)
